video_prompt: Stylish white tiger subtly shifts its gaze from right to center, its mouth subtly parting. Its striped tail subtly swishes left. The background street lights subtly shimmer as the ambient pink hues gently undulate. Slight movements in the tiger's jacket and pants suggest a soft breeze.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A stylish white tiger in a light pink Louis Vuitton jacket and pants, wearing pink rectangular glasses. Three-quarter shot, slightly open mouth, visible white and black striped fur. Blurred street background with lights and pink hues. Bright lighting, detailed, stylized animal fashion.
refined_video_prompt: Gaze subtly shifts from right to center. Mouth subtly parts. Tail subtly swishes left. Background street lights subtly shimmer. Ambient pink hues gently undulate. Slight movements ripple through its jacket and pants.
